snippet.title: Astronauts wanted for one-way ticket to Mars
snippet.description:
Astronauts wanted for one-way ticket to Mars
Toegevoegd door Agence France-Presse (AFP) vorig jaar
Who wants a one-way trip to Mars? Applications are now being accepted by a private firm which says it will deliver the first humans there in just 10 years -- and finance operations by making a reality TV show of life on the red planet.Duration: 1:20
110 views

snippet.title: A One Way Ticket to Mars
snippet.description:
A One Way Ticket to Mars
Toegevoegd door tvnportal laatste januari
In this week's show we talk to the man behind "Mars One", the initiative to build a human settlement on the Red Planet. Bas Lansdorp has got the answers to "How?" and "What for?" Plus, a test of life offline: is "web-detox" the solution?Video provided by France 24 Producer : France 24
23 views

snippet.title: One-way ticket to Mars
snippet.description:
One-way ticket to Mars
Toegevoegd door Al Jazeera English vorig jaar
A Dutch company is looking for volunteers to travel to Mars. About 10,000 people from 100 countries have apparently already expressed interest via email. But there is one catch: the would-be astronauts will not be coming back. Al Jazeera's John Terret reports from Washington, DC.
82 views

snippet.title: TGP #0527 | iOS 7 To Get New Design, One Way Ticket To Mars
snippet.description:
TGP #0527 | iOS 7 To Get New Design, One Way Ticket To Mars
Toegevoegd door Adrian Bacon laatste mei
In This Episode: Introducing Young Makers to Arduino, More than 20,000 people apply for one-way ticket to Mars, The Ten Weirdest Facts About Space Travel, BlackBerry CEO: Demand For Tablets Will Die Out in 5 Years, Canon 5D Mark III firmware update enables improved AF, uncompressed HDMI output, How to Use a Light Meter to Improve Your Photography, Olympia Circuit Arno Shield Offers An Easier Arduino Learning Curve, iOS 7 To Get New Design
6 views

snippet.title: Manitoban Vies for One Way Ticket to Mars
snippet.description:
Manitoban Vies for One Way Ticket to Mars
Toegevoegd door tvnportal laatste januari
A 31-year-old Manitoba woman is willing to give up life on Earth for a one-way ticket to Mars.Video provided by CBC Producer : CBC

snippet.title: Big demand for tickets to Mars colony
snippet.description:
Big demand for tickets to Mars colony
Toegevoegd door euronews-en vorig jaar
A Dutch company has received hundreds of requests for one-way tickets to its planned human settlement on Mars - due to be completed in 2023. The next eleven years will be spent setting up communication and infrastructure. However, no one will be able to come back because they cannot build a rocket able to return to Earth.http://www.euronews.net/
36 views

snippet.title: More Than 200,000 Apply For One-Way Trip to Mars
snippet.description:
More Than 200,000 Apply For One-Way Trip to Mars
Toegevoegd door Web TV laatste september
As of Monday, more than 200,000 people have applied to be part of the Mars One Project, a one-way trip to the red planet.
33 views
